Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the 26th Filmfare Awards and its winners?
Options:
A. a) Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award.
B. b) Laxmikant-Pyarelal won Best Music Director for the movie.
C. c) The 26th Filmfare Awards celebrated achievements in 2014.
D. d) Both a) and b) are correct.
Answer: d) Both a) and b) are correct.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Zeenat Aman and the 26th Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. a) Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
B. b) Radhu Karmakar was nominated for Best Cinematography at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
C. c) Zeenat Aman starred in the movie that was recognized at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
D. d) All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the 26th Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. a) Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award.
B. b) Raj Kapoor was nominated for Best Director.
C. c) The 26th Filmfare Awards took place in 2014.
D. d) Zeenat Aman was nominated for Best Supporting Actress.
Answer: a) Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award. and b) Raj Kapoor was nominated for Best Director.
